---
title: "Data Prep"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r setup}
# Packages ----
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r data}
music <- read_csv("../data/music-genre-raw.csv")
```

Explore data

```{r}
# Number of Genre counts
music |> 
  count(music_genre) |> 
  arrange(n)
```

Remove missing genre values

```{r}
music <- music |> 
  filter(!is.na(music_genre))
```

Write out updated data

```{r}
write_csv(music, "../data/music-genre-cleaned.csv")
```
